Package org.deeplearning4j.text.documentiterator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DocumentIterator
    Document Iterator: iterate over input streams
    LabelAwareDocumentIterator
    Created by agibsonccc on 10/18/14.
    LabelAwareIterator
    This simple iterator interface assumes, that all documents are packed into strings OR into references to VocabWords.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicLabelAwareIterator
    This is simple class, for building Sentence-Label pairs for ParagraphVectors/Doc2Vec.
    BasicLabelAwareIterator.Builder  
    BasicLabelAwareIteratorTest  
    DefaultDocumentIteratorTest
    Created by agibsonccc on 9/29/14.
    FileDocumentIterator
    Iterate over files
    FileDocumentIteratorTest
    Created by fartovii on 09.11.15.
    FileLabelAwareIterator
    This is simple filesystem-based LabelAware iterator.
    FileLabelAwareIterator.Builder  
    FileLabelAwareIteratorTest
    Created by raver119 on 03.01.16.
    FilenamesLabelAwareIterator
    This LabelAwareIterator scans folder for files, and returns them as LabelledDocuments.
    FilenamesLabelAwareIterator.Builder  
    FilenamesLabelAwareIteratorTest  
    LabelledDocument
    This is primitive holder of document, and it's label.
    LabelsSource
    This class is used to manage labels/documents syncronization over iterators
    LabelsSourceTest
    Created by raver on 26.11.2015.
    SimpleLabelAwareIterator
    This class provide option to build LabelAwareIterator from Iterable or Iterator objects
